1591590.name: Traxion 2
1591590.description:
TRAXION² is a cave flyer for 1 or 2 players.

Once again you take the role of a daring starship pilot, embarking on a series of break-neck mission in outer space. Navigate your ship through the caves of dangerous alien planets and find the valuable crystals hidden there. With your ship's tractor beam, you can tow these back to the planet surface. But beware -- alien creatures and enemy patrol ships are out to get you! Have you got what it takes to salvage all the crystals before your ship runs out of fuel?

This is the sequel to our earlier game TRAXION and offers improved graphics and sound, many new enemy types and challenges, as well as new two-player game modes.

The single player campaign features a series of increasingly challenging levels, each introducing a new enemy or gameplay element. In two-player coop mode, players must work together to retrieve the crystals from the depth of the alien planet. In two-player deathmatch mode, players compete for the crystals while trying to outsmart and demolish each other.

For online multiplayer matches, we recommend PARSEC.
1591590.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
